message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I'd like to propose a price of $100.
